name: Victory Spike
overview: Victory Spike is a volleyball game creatd by Imagineer in 1996. The game features 3 game modes: - World League: In this mode the player can select one of the 8 national teams (Japan, Rusia, Cuba, USA, China, Brazil,Holland & Italy). - Free Play: In this mode the player has three options - Play agains other human or the computer, a dream team match and see two computer players playing . - Tournament: 1 to 8 players can compete in a tournament with eight national teams to select (Japan, Rusia, Cuba, USA, China, Brazil,Holland & Italy). There is also an information that explains in japanese the volleyball rules and game controls. GAMEPLAY: To serve the player has to press any of the four buttons to start the serving movement and when the ball is in the air and change is colour to red the player haas to press the same button again,,to recieveis the same when the ball change is colour to red press the x button then to make a pass press the x button when the ball is red and to make and attack use any of the buttons to make differentas attacks when the ball is in red.
